name: Bandit Lord
description: The Bandit Lord is a robust humanoid clad in a breastplate, wielding a longsword and dagger. Its notable physical presence is emphasized by strong muscles and a commanding stance.
memorable: A skilled combatant and tactical leader, capable of coordinating bandit groups effectively in battle.
goals: To lead bandit raids and control territory through strength and strategy.
relations: Often leads other bandits into battle and may serve under more powerful criminals or warlords.
environment: Commonly found in forests, mountains, and areas where banditry thrives.
strengths: Possesses strong melee combat abilities enhanced by pack tactics and brute damage output.
weaknesses: Moderate wisdom and charisma may hinder its ability to strategize against insightful opponents.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack strategy with a longsword and a dagger, dealing significant slashing and piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Leadership ability enhances ally's attack rolls and saving throws, amplifying group effectiveness.
senses: Passive perception of 10 indicates average awareness.
skills: Skilled in athletics, deception, and intimidation, reflecting its role as a combat leader.
additional_information: Can give commands to allies through Leadership.
Gains advantage on attacks with Pack Tactics when allies are nearby.
Uses Parry to defend against melee attacks.
Shifts behind allies to divert attacks, showcasing tactical acumen.
Known for gathering groups of bandits for raids.

strong melee combatant with leadership skills
